description: Links implemented actions to CSAT/NPS metric changes to prove ROI

trackedActions.actionTitle: Emergency fix for bank account linking dropdown bug
trackedActions.successMetrics: Bank linking success rate reaches 95%+ within 48 hours of fix deployment. Zero reports of empty dropdown in subsequent week. Error logging captures 100% of linking attempts.

trackedActions.actionTitle: Implement proactive account freeze notification system
trackedActions.successMetrics: 100% of account freezes include prior notification (where legally permissible). Negative reviews mentioning surprise freezes decrease by 80%. Support tickets for frozen accounts decrease by 50% due to proactive communication.
